languages.text: {n}Абеляр сокрушенно смотрит на камень. Его губа слегка подрагивает, то ли от вновь нахлынувшей горечи, то ли от ярости, что кто-то посмел так чудовищно нарушить покой Теодоры. Наконец, он заставляет себя отвернуться, не проронив ни слова.{/n}

{n}Abelard stares at the gem with a crestfallen expression. His lip twitches as if he is struggling against a new wave of grief or else enraged at the thought of someone so heinously violating Theodora's rest. He forces himself to look away without saying a word.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Абеляр сокрушенно смотрит на камень. Его губа слегка подрагивает, то ли от вновь нахлынувшей горечи, то ли от ярости, что кто-то посмел так чудовищно нарушить покой Теодоры. Наконец, он заставляет себя отвернуться, не проронив ни слова.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Abelard stares at the gem with a crestfallen expression. His lip twitches, either a sign of him struggling against a new sudden wave of grief or enraged at the thought of someone so heinously violating Theodora's rest. He forces himself to look away without saying a word.{/n}

{n}Abelard stares at the gem with a crestfallen expression. His lip twitches, either a sign of him struggling against a new sudden wave of grief or enraged at the thought of someone so heinously violating Theodora's rest. He forces himself to look away without saying a word.{/n}

{n}Abelard stares at the gem with a crestfallen expression. His lip twitches as if he is struggling against a new wave of grief or else enraged at the thought of someone so heinously violating Theodora's rest. He forces himself to look away without saying a word.{/n}

{n}Abelard stares at the gem with a crestfallen expression. His lip twitches as if he is struggling against a new wave of grief or else enraged at the thought of someone so heinously violating Theodora's rest. He forces himself to look away without saying a word.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Abélard fixe la pierre précieuse d'un air abattu, les lèvres tremblantes, comme s'il luttait contre une nouvelle vague de chagrin... ou qu'il essayait de dissimuler sa fureur à l'idée que quelqu'un puisse ainsi nuire au repos de Théodora. Sans un mot, il finit par se forcer à détourner le regard.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard stares at the gem with a crestfallen expression. His lip twitches as if he is struggling against a new wave of grief or else enraged at the thought of someone so heinously violating Theodora's rest. He forces himself to look away without saying a word.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Abélard fixe la pierre précieuse d'un air abattu, les lèvres tremblantes, comme s'il luttait contre une nouvelle vague de chagrin... ou qu'il essayait de dissimuler sa fureur à l'idée que quelqu'un puisse ainsi nuire au repos de Théodora. Sans un mot, il finit par se forcer à détourner le regard.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Abelard observa la gema con expresión alicaída. Su labio tiembla como si estuviera sufriendo una oleada de pena o de furia ante la idea de alguien profanando el descanso de Theodora de forma tan vil. Se fuerza a apartar la mirada sin decir palabra.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard stares at the gem with a crestfallen expression. His lip twitches as if he is struggling against a new wave of grief or else enraged at the thought of someone so heinously violating Theodora's rest. He forces himself to look away without saying a word.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Abelard observa la gema con expresión alicaída. Su labio tiembla como si estuviera sufriendo una oleada de pena o de furia ante la idea de alguien profanando el descanso de Theodora de forma tan vil. Se fuerza a apartar la mirada sin decir palabra.{/n}

languages.text: {n}阿贝拉德怏怏不乐地盯着那颗宝石，嘴唇不住抽搐着，仿佛在努力遏制着从心底涌起的悲伤，也可能是在竭力克制着怒火，因为居然有人胆敢打扰西奥多拉的安息。他一言不发，强迫自己移开了视线。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard stares at the gem with a crestfallen expression. His lip twitches as if he is struggling against a new wave of grief or else enraged at the thought of someone so heinously violating Theodora's rest. He forces himself to look away without saying a word.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}阿贝拉德怏怏不乐地盯着那颗宝石，嘴唇不住抽搐着，仿佛在努力遏制着从心底涌起的悲伤，也可能是在竭力克制着怒火，因为居然有人胆敢打扰西奥多拉的安息。他一言不发，强迫自己移开了视线。{/n}

languages.text: {n}アベラルドは、しゅんとした表情で宝石を見た。彼の唇は震えていた。それは、まるで新たな悲しみの波と闘っているかのようだった。あるいは、シオドーラの休息を妨害する者がいることに激怒しているかのようだった。彼は何も言わずに無理やり目をそらした。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard stares at the gem with a crestfallen expression. His lip twitches as if he is struggling against a new wave of grief or else enraged at the thought of someone so heinously violating Theodora's rest. He forces himself to look away without saying a word.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}アベラルドは、しゅんとした表情で宝石を見た。彼の唇は震えていた。それは、まるで新たな悲しみの波と闘っているかのようだった。あるいは、シオドーラの休息を妨害する者がいることに激怒しているかのようだった。彼は何も言わずに無理やり目をそらした。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Abelard starrt mit erschütterter Miene auf den Edelstein. Seine Lippe zuckt, als würde er gegen eine neue Welle der Trauer ankämpfen oder wäre erzürnt darüber, dass jemand Theodoras letzte Ruhe auf so niederträchtige Weise stören würde. Er zwingt sich, wegzublicken, ohne ein Wort zu sagen.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard stares at the gem with a crestfallen expression. His lip twitches as if he is struggling against a new wave of grief or else enraged at the thought of someone so heinously violating Theodora's rest. He forces himself to look away without saying a word.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Abelard starrt mit erschütterter Miene auf den Edelstein. Seine Lippe zuckt, als würde er gegen eine neue Welle der Trauer ankämpfen oder wäre erzürnt darüber, dass jemand Theodoras letzte Ruhe auf so niederträchtige Weise stören würde. Er zwingt sich, wegzublicken, ohne ein Wort zu sagen.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Abelard, taşa kederli bir yüz ifadesiyle bakıyor. Dudakları kasılıyor ve Theodora'nın istirahatgâhını böylesine canice kirleten birinin var olmasına karşı duyduğu keder ya da öfke dalgasına karşı mücadele ediyor gibi görünüyor. Kendini hiçbir şey söylemeden başka yöne bakmaya zorluyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard stares at the gem with a crestfallen expression. His lip twitches as if he is struggling against a new wave of grief or else enraged at the thought of someone so heinously violating Theodora's rest. He forces himself to look away without saying a word.{/n}
